item.description:
I happen to believe that there isn't a background check or Google search in the world that can beat your intuition and perception. Your instincts, along with basic critical thinking skills, are what will help you avoid wasting time on men that aren't being honest or truthful.

Â 

PREPAYMENT REQUIRED - $23 IF YOU REGISTER WITH PROMO CODE ATWYS

http://atwysshadydatersteleclass.eventbrite.com/


This teleclass session will review some of the more crucial questions we should ask ourselves when we're getting to know someone new.

1. What do these men say in their dating profiles and electronic communications (text, email, etc.)

2. How do those words match up to their actions?

3. How does their behavior align with "typical" dating behavior.

Together we will deconstruct common dating experiences that we all encounter. What you'll learn in your session is how to develop objective but accurate observations about the opposite sex using skills and tool that don't require an internet connection.

WHAT TO BRING:
*Have at least 1 dating profile of a man that you have contacted via an online dating site
*Personal stories or experiences where you believed someone was being dishonest and deceptive
*Your gut instincts

WHAT I'LL BRING:
*Real life stories that have been submitted to me for analysis and feedback that demonstrate possible deception. I will walk you through my process and show you how I come to my conclusions.

This is NOT a class where you will learn how to cyber-creep. When your instincts are in tune and well honed, you won't have to do that.

This will teleclass should last about 60-90 minutes depending on the size of the class.

Men and women are welcome to participate.



READ TESTIMONIALS FROM PAST ATTENDEES:

http://andthatswhyyouresingle.com/testimonials/


READ MY BIO:

http://andthatswhyyouresingle.com/about-2/
item.name: How to Spot & Avoid The Shady Daters Teleclass
